about_the_game:
Step into the beginning of Nate's story in the exclusive demo version of Naught Nate. Play as Nate, a 21-year-old college student facing the early challenges of adulthood, financial stress, and a job search that leads him to an unusual cosplay store. At this store, Nate meets Dia, a captivating cosplayer, and an interesting, unexpected bond forms between them.

In this demo, witness Nate's first days at the cosplay store and his initial interactions with Dia. The choices you make shape Nate’s relationships, revealing two unique endings.

Introductory Story: Experience Nate's first meeting with Dia and explore the bond that develops between them. This demo provides a short glimpse into Nate's challenges and evolving feelings.

Choice-Based Gameplay: Every decision influences Nate and Dia's relationship, leading to one of two different endings in the demo.

Visuals and Atmosphere: Discover high-quality character artwork and a warm cosplay store setting that reflects Nate's world.

Nate: A 21-year-old college student who is intelligent, kind-hearted, and a bit naive. Nate's journey is one of learning to balance the demands of adulthood, love, and his own desires.

Dia: A 21-year-old cosplayer with a charming personality and a mysterious past. Dia draws Nate into a world of fantasy and reality. She is confident, playful, and deeply passionate about her craft.

Boss: The 35-year-old tough manager of the cosplay store.

In this demo, there are hints of themes that will be further explored in the full version of Naught Nate. Although this version does not include explicit scenes, it sets the stage for the story to come.

content_descriptors.notes:
The developers describe the content like this:

This game may contain content that is not appropriate for all ages or may be inappropriate for viewing in the workplace: Rare Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

name: Naughty Nate : Cosplay Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Nate starts working as a cashier at a cosplay store to earn money. After meeting a beautiful girl, Nate embarks on an intense and passionate relationship. Naughty Nate invites you into Nate's romantic and erotic adventures.
